casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Robert Lionel STAFFORD. No. 286P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 31, 2006. Robert Lionel Stafford, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Michael Bonfoey, District Attorney, for State of NC.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the application filed by Defendant on the 26th day of May 2006 in this matter for Writ of Habeas Corpus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Haywood County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 31st day of May 2006."
